titles.title: Guskou Budori no Denki
The Biography of Guskou Budori
The Life of Guskou Budori
グスコーブドリの伝記

anime.description: * Based on The Biography of Guskou Budori from http://anidb.net/cr4684 [Miyazawa Kenji]. The story follows the life of a young boy named Guskou who lives in the countryside with his parents and little sister. A string of droughts and other natural disasters tear the family apart, and Guskou is forced to leave home and seek his fortunes on his own. Driven by a desire to improve the quality of life of his poor countrymen, he eventually joins a group of scientists called the Iihatov Volcano Department, and there takes part in scientific projects to fight the natural disasters that drove him from his home. Source: http://www.pelleas.net/reviews/#7 Note: The Biography of Guskou Budori was the recipient of numerous awards including the Monbusho Selection.
